name: Cinnamon Cap Mushroom
description: Cinnamon Caps are small, orange to pinkish mushrooms with flaky caps. They have a nutty, earthy flavor and crunchy texture. They are delicious sautéed, grilled, baked or roasted. Cinnamon Caps grow quickly and abundantly in clusters on large wood substrates or inoculated logs.
sowing_method: Inoculate log or wood substrate with spores
